name: Federal Highways Road Construction
description: The Federal Executive is ordered to: - do all in its power to build up the Federal Highways district to a proper designed and functional road - the highway shall:    - be at the same height as the capital    - include bridges and/or tunnels where needed - make regulations for the precise design of the highways - hire Federal Highways Workers to assist in the work of constuction. - be responsible for the work the Highways Workers do including verification that all regulations and laws are followed in the process of constructing the highways - give out seperate contracts with own payment for constuction of tunnels and bridges, in case they determine those are needed - choose and apply the road payout via moving some amount of currency into the appropiate Federal Infrastructure Payout accountsFederal Highways Workers shall: - receive a standard payment for laying down both stone roads and asphalt

properties.Title: Stone Road (Tracking)
properties.UserDescription: Track payment for placement of and fee for removal of stone roads.
